#OnlyStudy
browse_description: Explore a wide range of courses and resources to enhance your knowledge and skills.
about_description: Learn about OnlyStudy and our mission to provide high-quality education to students around the world.
contact_description: Contact us for any questions or feedback.
privacy_description: Learn about our privacy policy and how we protect your personal information.
terms_description: Read our terms of service to understand the conditions and rules for using OnlyStudy.
team_description: Meet the team behind OnlyStudy and learn about their roles and expertise.
about_p1: OnlyStudy is an online learning platform designed to help students prepare for their exams through expert-led courses, mock tests, and personalized mentorship.
about_p2: Whether you're studying for a medical, architectural, or academic entrance exam, we connect you with qualified instructors and resources that make a difference.
about_p3: Our goal is to provide high-quality, affordable, and accessible education for everyone. With OnlyStudy, you can learn at your own pace‚Äîanytime, anywhere.
about_p4: Join thousands of students already using OnlyStudy to achieve their academic goals.
privacy_p1: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how OnlyStudy collects, uses, and protects your personal information.
privacy_p2: We collect personal information like your name, email, and payment details when you register or purchase a course.
privacy_p3: We use your data to provide educational content, improve our services, and send you relevant updates.
privacy_p4: We may use trusted third-party tools (like payment processors or analytics) that handle your data in compliance with their own policies.
privacy_p5: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access or disclosure.
privacy_p6: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data at any time by contacting us.
privacy_p7: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy to reflect any changes in our practices or legal requirements.
privacy_p8: By using OnlyStudy, you agree to our Privacy Policy. If you have any questions, please contact us at support@example.com.
terms_p1: By accessing and using OnlyStudy, you agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy.
terms_p2: You agree to use our services for lawful purposes only and not to misuse any of the content or platforms provided.
terms_p3: You must provide accurate information when creating an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
terms_p4: All content provided on OnlyStudy is owned by us or our instructors and may not be reproduced or distributed without permission.
terms_p5: We reserve the right to update these Terms to reflect any changes in our practices or legal requirements.
terms_p6: By using OnlyStudy, you agree to our Terms. If you have any questions, please contact us at support@example.com.
